Projects

Projects

These are some of the projects I’ve been working on. I’ll be documenting some of the projects in my repo here.

  • Cat1 : A rendering engine I’ve working on while learning the OpenGL API and some computer graphics stuff.

  • Tysoc : A simulator engine based on Bullet3 that used the before mentioned engine for visualization.

  • Computer Graphics final project : A port of the DeepTerrainRL project to Modern OpenGL.
